title: Full Stack Remix Online Shop
description: Free download full open source code for learn and built online shop website with full stack remix
text: If you need built modern website information using full stack remix so we can help you, and of course you can select your favorite technology and framework too.. react , next, gatsby, angular , svelte , sapper, blazor wasm , or built with static site generator jekyll, eleventy 11ty and astro.
services: Website development service for company profile, online shop, restaurant cafe, coffee shop, school , art work, art gallery , movie, dj , podcast , and others. of course we can help you too for optimation your site , like improve your website speed and SEO.
content1: A full stack react web app with remix integration with other database firebase realtime, mongo db, sqlite and others. include with prisma
intro: Frontend Backend with remix full stack app
text2: Remix is complete for develope your modern site, you can use backend web admin panel with integration database for create , update and delete post article product , and integration with your frontend web app.
prisma: By using prisma we can settup and customise a database structure table with your own, very easy just run on your terminal.
cli: npx prisma db push && npx prisma db seed && npx prisma migrate dev
